Quick_Strike.help: A quick attack that sometimes knock foes down. Fast, but low damage. Damage: Low, Recharge: Fast

Smashing_Blow.help: Smashing Blow is a slow attack, but makes up for it with a good amount of damage. Has a greater chance to stun than body blow. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Repulsing_Torrent.help: Repulsing Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Burst.help: By focusing your energy into the muscles in your arms, you can launch a dizzying flurry of attacks against every foe in melee range. Some foes may be hit hard enough to be knocked down as well. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Focused_Burst.help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance. Focused Burst deals high damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

High_Pain_Tolerance.help: You have a greater tolerance to pain than others. You are also slightly resistant to all types of damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

Quick_Recovery.help: You recover Endurance at a faster rate than normal. This power is always on.

Heightened_Senses.help: You become more aware of your environment and its hazards while this power is activated. This will increase your Defense versus environmental damage as long as it is active. Your Heightened Senses also allow you to perceive stealthy foes and resist Defense DeBuffs. Recharge: Fast
Heightened_Senses.shortHelp: Toggle: Self +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy), +Per
Heightened_Senses.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} have increased your defenses to environmental effects.
